TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit FixedAddressValueTypeAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class FixedAddressValueTypeAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class FixedAddressValueTypeAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 在整個存留期 (Lifetime) 中，固定靜態值型別欄位的位址。

span.span: Fixes the address of a static value type field throughout its lifetime.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來標記的靜態值類型作為釘選在建立時。Use the attribute to mark static value types as pinned upon creation. Microsoft Visual c + + 編譯器會使用這個屬性。This attribute is used by the Microsoft Visual C++ compiler. 靜態值類型欄位會建立為 boxed 物件。Static value type fields are created as boxed objects. 這表示因為執行記憶體回收回收時，可以變更其位址。This means that their address can change as garbage collection is performed. 當您將此屬性套用至靜態值型別時，其位址會維持不變存留期間。When you apply this attribute to a static value type, its address remains constant during its lifetime. ## Examples 下列範例說明使用釘選在記憶體中的靜態欄位的屬性。The following example illustrates the use of the attribute to pin a static field in memory. 它會定義`Age`結構，並初始化具有類型的靜態欄位的兩個類別`Age`。It defines an `Age` structure and initializes two classes that have static fields of type `Age`. 第二個類別適用於釘選欄位的位址。The second class applies to pin the field's address. 之前與之後這兩個物件具現化，並叫用記憶體回收行程進行記憶體配置數目。A number of memory allocations are made before and after these two objects are instantiated and the garbage collector is invoked. 範例輸出顯示，但第一個位址`Age`欄位已變更之後，記憶體回收的欄位的位址套用尚未。The output from the example shows that although the address of the first `Age` field has changed after garbage collection, the address of the field to which is applied has not. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.FixedAddressValueTypeAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.fixedaddressvaluetypeattribute/cs/example1.cs#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例說明使用釘選在記憶體中的靜態欄位的屬性。The following example illustrates the use of the attribute to pin a static field in memory. 它會定義`Age`結構，並初始化具有類型的靜態欄位的兩個類別`Age`。It defines an `Age` structure and initializes two classes that have static fields of type `Age`. 第二個類別適用於釘選欄位的位址。The second class applies to pin the field's address. 之前與之後這兩個物件具現化，並叫用記憶體回收行程進行記憶體配置數目。A number of memory allocations are made before and after these two objects are instantiated and the garbage collector is invoked. 範例輸出顯示，但第一個位址`Age`欄位已變更之後，記憶體回收的欄位的位址套用尚未。The output from the example shows that although the address of the first `Age` field has changed after garbage collection, the address of the field to which is applied has not. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.FixedAddressValueTypeAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.fixedaddressvaluetypeattribute/cs/example1.cs#1)]
